Content.Content:
[$BOX] [$CELL] [$BLOCK]

Data Collection and Use

  • CCTV records video footage continuously or during specific times as deemed necessary.
  • Footage is used solely for the purposes outlined in this policy.
  • Access to footage is restricted to authorized personnel and will not be shared with unauthorized third parties unless required by law or with consent.
[$/BLOCK] [$/CELL] [$/BOX]
Content.Name: Data Collection and Use
